General.Name: Compania Espanola de Viviendas en Alquiler SA
General.Description: Compañía Española de Viviendas en Alquiler S.A. engages in the real estate business in Spain. It rents and leases offices; parking spaces, and commercial properties. Compañía Española de Viviendas en Alquiler S.A. was founded in 1968 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.
